tooltip: The aquatic passage score for the road-stream crossing (0 = Impassable, 1 = Completely passable)
Type of stream crossing structure (1 = Culvert, 2 = Bridge, 3 = Dam)
Drainage area (square kilometers) of all upstream reaches to first encountered road-stream crossing
Drainage area (square kilometers) of all upstream reaches
Stream length (kilometers) of all upstream reaches to first encountered road-stream crossing
Stream length (kilometers) of all upstream reaches
Total number of upstream structures crossing the stream
The slope of the stream reach containing the crossing
The predicted two-year high discharge value determined using the Jacob's regime equation for gravel dominated stream beds
The total energy exerted by the stream divided by the width of the stream determined using Q2 discharge and bankful width
Hydrologic risk of failure probability for stream crossing (0 = Good, 1 = Poor)
Structural risk of failure probability for road-stream crossing (0 = Good, 1 = Poor)
Geomorphic risk of failure probability for road-stream crossing (0 = Good, 1 = Poor)
Average traffic delay to emergency sevices for all trips if road-stream crossing becomes compromised
Average traffic delay to emergency sevices to affected trips if road-stream crossing becomes compromised
Maximum traffic delay to emergency sevices for all trips if road-stream crossing becomes compromised
Date the crossing was field assessed (NA indicates crossing has not been field assessed)
Percentage of the catchment used for agriculture
Average elevation (meters) of the catchment
Percentage of the catchment covered with forest
Percentage of the catchment covered with impervious surface
Average slope (percent) of the catchment
Percentage of the catchment covered with water
Stream order (Strahler method) of stream reach
Probability of habitat suitability of stream reach for brook trout
Average summer temperature (degrees celsius) of stream reach
Total summed differences (degrees celsius) between predicted water temperature and air temperature for the spring to fall time period
